sentences: See asi on kasutu ja väärtusetu.
Tööriistad olid vananenud ja kasutuseta jäänud.
Me peame tegema midagi selle kasutu esemega.
context: The word 'kasutu' in Estonian is an adjective that means something is useless, worthless, or unusable. It describes objects, things, or situations that have no practical value or purpose. The word can be used to describe tools, items, concepts, or even abstract ideas that serve no useful function.
